name: Spellbook Demonslayers Prologue
description:
This is the free version of Spellbook Demonslayers - A roguelite horde survival game inspired by Vampire Survivors and Path of Exile: Choose your character, combine new spells & upgrades each run to defeat thousands of demons, then use your rewards to become stronger & faster.

Your spells are cast automatically, so you can get straight into the demon slaying action!





Powerful Elite Demons will make nearby enemies stronger... but defeating them lets you steal their power for yourself!




Create Overpowered Builds using a wide variety of spells and upgrades!




Unlock Permanent Upgrades by finding precious Astral Flowers!

Features

  • An energetic metal soundtrack!
  • Unlock lots of spells, characters, and more!
  • Full controller / keyboard / mouse support.
  • Play for 13, 20, or 30 minutes in a session.


https://store.steampowered.com/app/2007530/Spellbook_Demonslayers/
  • More characters, each with a signature spell and passive
  • New maps with unlockable upgrades, which can go up to 20 and 30 minutes.
  • Lots of difficulty options to customize
  • New Enemies, and bosses
  • Full access to the permanent upgrade system
  • Achievements
